org.apache.flink.runtime.operators

Enum DriverStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DriverStrategy>
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.DriverStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<DriverStrategy>

    public enum DriverStrategy
extends Enum<DriverStrategy>
    Enumeration of all available operator strategies.
